ReportSection.title: Incrementation - Incrementation Awarded as Recommended
ReportSection.ReportItem:
I am writing to inform you that the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) has accepted the recommendation of your Department Chair and awarded you {getText(RP_CHAIR, FEC_REVIEW, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 0, 0)} increment in recognition of your achievements during the {$last_year}/{substr({$this_year},2,2)} period under review. The award takes effect on July 1, {$next_year}.

Thank you for your contributions to the University, and I wish you great success during the coming year.
